code: import React,{createContext,useState,useEffect}from"react";import{login as loginUser,logout as logoutUser}from"../services/authService";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const AuthContext=/*#__PURE__*/createContext();export const AuthProvider=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const[user,setUser]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const storedUser=localStorage.getItem("user");if(storedUser)setUser(JSON.parse(storedUser));},[]);const login=async(email,password)=>{const loggedInUser=await loginUser(email,password);setUser(loggedInUser);localStorage.setItem("user",JSON.stringify(loggedInUser));};const logout=()=>{logoutUser();setUser(null);localStorage.removeItem("user");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AuthContext.Provider,{value:{user,login,logout},children:children});};
